message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a savvy negotiator. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, so I can offer it to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a limited budget. Can you do any better than that?

I understand you have a limited budget, Bob, but I've already met you halfway and then some. I can see you're serious about the product, so I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $98. Can you accept that price?
I think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing money on the deal. I can offer it to you for $110, but that's as low as I can go.
